item.title: Elizabeth Olsen’s ‘Eternity’ to Open Hamptons International Film Festival (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Elizabeth Olsen is hitting the sand with “Eternity,” as her new film directed by David Freyne will open this year’s Hamptons International Film Festival. Olsen will attend the October gathering in the
